name: GNOP (ExQuid_)
description:
Bugs will no longer get fixed since I´m working on a new game called Ytre. It will be released here around June or July. Stay tuned

KNOWN BUGS:

Ball sometimes get stuck in player sending it at lightning speed either up or down causing an instant loss. These buggs will hopefully be fixed in patch 1.0.1 So stay tuned for that.

(Hold T for a simple cheat) <--- This cheat will be disabled in patch 1.0.1 so have fun with it while you can! :)
